actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT id, 
title, url, 
image_url, 
is_deleted, 
description, 
price,
created_at_utc, 
created_by, 
updated_at_utc, 
updated_by,
activity_ids,
	(Select STRING_AGG(am.name, ',') 
	 FROM public."ActivitiesMaster" as am 
	 Where am.id = ANY(art.activity_ids)) as activities
	FROM public."Products" as art
	WHERE  title ilike '%{{ ProductTable.searchText}}%'
ORDER BY created_at_utc DESC
LIMIT {{ProductTable.pageSize}}
OFFSET (({{ProductTable.pageNo - 1}})*{{ProductTable.pageSize}});
